includes a ProjectProject Explorer view that helps you organize your projects. offers a variety of helpful features for working with projects and makes it easy to share your projects with other members of your team. This section presents various unique features that will help you to create and work with projects.There are several sample project templates available for DITA users that can be used as a starting point or for inspiration. These sample project templates are found in the Framework templates DITA folder in the New Project wizard:
Sample DITA Project - This is a very basic DITA project meant to help new users.
Startup DITA Project - This is a more advanced sample DITA project that imposes a custom set of options and a custom DITA framework extension. This is meant to help users who want to customize the DITA editing environment.
